abstract: Leap Wireless International has tapped as hired advisers and formed a special board committee to look into a sale or merger for the prepaid cellphone service provider, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Leap Wireless International has tapped as hired advisers and formed a special board committee to look into a sale or merger for the prepaid cellphone service provider, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Could Leap Wireless International and MetroPCS Communications finally be headed for a courtship, more than two years after Leap rejected an unsolicited proposal from its rival?

headline.main: Is Leap Wireless Considering a Deal With MetroPCS?
